description: Schema definition for the collection of the CFO Act agencies' DCOI Strategic Plans
title: DCOI Strategic Plan Schema version fy2019

___optimizationMetrics.name: OptimizationMetrics
___optimizationMetrics.description: The set of DCOI optimization metrics
___optimizationMetrics.title: Optimization metrics

___availability.name: availability
___availability.description: Targets for a given agency for each fiscal year in the availability optimization metric
___availability.title: Availability

___explanationForUnmetPlannedValues.name: explanationForUnmetPlannedValues
___explanationForUnmetPlannedValues.description: Explanation for an unmet planned value in the given optimization metric.
___explanationForUnmetPlannedValues.title: explanationForUnmetPlannedValue

___fy20Planned.name: fy20Planned
___fy20Planned.description: Value your agency plans to achieve by the end of fiscal year 2020 in the given optimization metric.
___fy20Planned.title: fy20Planned

___fy19Planned.name: fy19Planned
___fy19Planned.description: Value your agency plans to reach by the end of fiscal year 2019 in the given optimization metric.
___fy19Planned.title: fy19Planned

___underutilizedServers.name: underutilizedServers

___underutilizedServers.title: Underutilized Servers

___methodology.name: methodology
___methodology.description: Explanation for the methodology your agency used to arrive at the Under Utilized Servers metric. If the methodology is different between data centers, please explain in the inventory comments field.
